attributes.action: live on money amounts that are set by parliament for ordinary working class.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I'd like to see the members of parliament "manage" to live on the amounts that they think we, the working class, can live on.
Its all very well they set out what the minimum wage, taxes, fuel costs, etc, are but when they earn what they earn in parliament this is hardly EVER going to affect them.
I'd like to see them have to 'manage' to live on what we do!  Either that or let REAL people with normal wages like us work in parliament.
